definition: foundation/grounding/background/what lies at the bottom of sth/root/cause
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)
background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base

sentences.english: So Mr. Lu Xun says, China roots in taoism.
sentences.chinese: 所以魯迅先生才說，中國的根底在道教。

sentences.english: From now on in good friends are based on two men became a blood sisters.
sentences.chinese: 從此在好朋友的根底上兩人又成了親姐妹。

sentences.english: Lactose is also not present in soy-based formulas.
sentences.chinese: 乳糖是今朝還沒有在年夜豆爲根底的公式。

sentences.english: The foundation of true happiness is in the conscience.
sentences.chinese: 真正的愉快之根底在於本心。

sentences.english: This is the sustained and rapid development of Sino-US trade to an objective basis.
sentences.chinese: 這就是中美商業可以持續快速開展地客不雅根底。

sentences.english: Sky-mobi was founded and built through innovation and internally developed technologies.
sentences.chinese: 斯凱網絡樹立在技術創新和外部研發的根底上。

sentences.english: Non-prosecution decision system should embody the demands of justice and efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 不起訴軌制應該表示正義與效率的根底要求。

sentences.english: Map reading and map using are the basic skills of soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 識圖趺圖是兵士的根底足藝。

definition: inside information/the ins and outs of the matter/how things stand/what's up
the whys and the wherefores/the detailed story/root cause
what is true and what is false/(to get to know) the real situation
